list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Update docker-compose configurations and application.yml files
This commit updates the RabbitMQ version, and modifies application.yml in different modules. It also introduces new docker-compose configurations for the prod and QA environments, with adjustments in their respective common-config.yml files. Minor changes include formatting and adding certain properties in the application yml files, while certain properties in pom.xml files have been modified. Furthermore, a new file .gitignore has also been introduced.

project.component: { "keyToString": { "ASKED_MARK_IGNORED_FILES_AS_EXCLUDED": "true", "HTTP Request.CardsApplication | #1.executor": "Run", "Notification.DisplayName-DoNotAsk-Database detector": "Database detector", "Notification.DisplayName-DoNotAsk-HotSwap": "Hot Swap performed", "Notification.DoNotAsk-Database detector": "true", "Notification.DoNotAsk-HotSwap": "true", "RequestMappingsPanelOrder0": "0", "RequestMappingsPanelOrder1": "1", "RequestMappingsPanelWidth0": "75", "RequestMappingsPanelWidth1": "75", "RunOnceActivity.ShowReadmeOnStart": "true", "SHARE_PROJECT_CONFIGURATION_FILES": "true", "Spring Boot.AccountsApplication.executor": "Debug", "Spring Boot.CardsApplication.executor": "Debug", "Spring Boot.ConfigServerApplication.executor": "Debug", "Spring Boot.ConfigserverApplication.executor": "Debug", "Spring Boot.LoansApplication.executor": "Debug", "git-widget-placeholder": "master", "kotlin-language-version-configured": "true", "last_opened_file_path": "C:/Users/DELL/Desktop/UdemyMicroservices/microservices/section4/spingboot-v2/docker-compose/qa", "node.js.detected.package.eslint": "true", "node.js.detected.package.tslint": "true", "node.js.selected.package.eslint": "(autodetect)", "node.js.selected.package.tslint": "(autodetect)", "nodejs_package_manager_path": "npm", "project.structure.last.edited": "Project", "project.structure.proportion": "0.0", "project.structure.side.proportion": "0.2", "run.configurations.included.in.services": "true", "settings.editor.selected.configurable": "spring", "vue.rearranger.settings.migration": "true" } }

task.summary:
Update project configurations and add new module
The project configurations have been updated by deleting irrelevant files and updating the project's .iml file. In addition, a new module called 'configserver' has been introduced; its source code uses the "UTF-8" character encoding, related options have been added to the compiler's additional options, and pom.xml file is included in the module settings. Finally, a new banner.txt file has been added to the configserver module.

Add ConfigServer application
Created a new Spring Boot application named ConfigServer. The application includes a new .gitignore file, an application configuration file, a main application class, and a test class. Generated necessary files to handle the project dependencies, including pom.xml and Maven Wrappers.

Add new configuration files for bank modules
The commit introduces new configuration files for account, card, and loan modules in the config server. They are specified for each environment: prod, QA, and local. Additionally, updates have been done on application.yml to specify the location of these files. Also included are modifications in .idea/compiler.xml and .idea/workspace.xml files.

Update workspace xml and application yml configurations
The changes primarily focus on updating the workspace xml file by removing unnecessary file changes, replacing CDATA with direct quotations, and adding a new work item duration. Simultaneously, the config server's application yml file was modified to point to a new search location.

Update workspace XML and application YML configurations
The workspace XML and application YML configurations were revised primarily to remove unnecessary file changes, swap CDATA with direct quotes, and augment the work item duration. Concurrently, the locations in the config server's application YML file were updated to direct towards new search locations. Additionally, options related to RunManager and localTasksCounter got modifed.

Refine workspace XML and application YML configurations
This update primarily modifies the workspace XML and application YML configurations. Unnecessary file changes have been removed, while CDATA was replaced with direct quotes and the work item duration was increased. The config server's application YML file was updated to direct towards new search locations, and modifications were made to options related to RunManager and localTasksCounter.

Add RabbitMQ service and update service dependencies
The docker-compose configuration is updated to include RabbitMQ as a new service. The healthcheck, extended configuration, and dependency for each existing service (configserver, accounts, loans, cards) are also set to ensure correct startup order and isolation. Furthermore, a common configuration file has been introduced to avoid redundancy and ensure consistency across all microservices.

Update config setting names and identifiers
The configuration settings in the YAML files and DTOs have been updated. Changes include modifications of the git URI to HTTPS, correction of readiness and liveness state keys, and changes in configuration property prefixes for card and loans services. Furthermore, rearranges the port configuration to the end of the file and adjusts the active profile setting in cards application.

Update docker-compose configurations and application.yml files
This commit updates the RabbitMQ version, and modifies application.yml in different modules. It also introduces new docker-compose configurations for the prod and QA environments, with adjustments in their respective common-config.yml files. Minor changes include formatting and adding certain properties in the application yml files, while certain properties in pom.xml files have been modified. Furthermore, a new file .gitignore has also been introduced.

MESSAGE.value:
Update project configurations and add new module
The project configurations have been updated by deleting irrelevant files and updating the project's .iml file. In addition, a new module called 'configserver' has been introduced; its source code uses the "UTF-8" character encoding, related options have been added to the compiler's additional options, and pom.xml file is included in the module settings. Finally, a new banner.txt file has been added to the configserver module.

Add ConfigServer application
Created a new Spring Boot application named ConfigServer. The application includes a new .gitignore file, an application configuration file, a main application class, and a test class. Generated necessary files to handle the project dependencies, including pom.xml and Maven Wrappers.

Add new configuration files for bank modules
The commit introduces new configuration files for account, card, and loan modules in the config server. They are specified for each environment: prod, QA, and local. Additionally, updates have been done on application.yml to specify the location of these files. Also included are modifications in .idea/compiler.xml and .idea/workspace.xml files.

Update workspace xml and application yml configurations
The changes primarily focus on updating the workspace xml file by removing unnecessary file changes, replacing CDATA with direct quotations, and adding a new work item duration. Simultaneously, the config server's application yml file was modified to point to a new search location.

Update workspace XML and application YML configurations
The workspace XML and application YML configurations were revised primarily to remove unnecessary file changes, swap CDATA with direct quotes, and augment the work item duration. Concurrently, the locations in the config server's application YML file were updated to direct towards new search locations. Additionally, options related to RunManager and localTasksCounter got modifed.

Refine workspace XML and application YML configurations
This update primarily modifies the workspace XML and application YML configurations. Unnecessary file changes have been removed, while CDATA was replaced with direct quotes and the work item duration was increased. The config server's application YML file was updated to direct towards new search locations, and modifications were made to options related to RunManager and localTasksCounter.

Enable health and endpoint probes in application configuration
Enhancements have been made in the application.yml file to enable health readiness and liveness states in the configuration server. Additionally, endpoint health probes have been activated, improving the system's resilience and operability.

Add RabbitMQ service and update service dependencies
The docker-compose configuration is updated to include RabbitMQ as a new service. The healthcheck, extended configuration, and dependency for each existing service (configserver, accounts, loans, cards) are also set to ensure correct startup order and isolation. Furthermore, a common configuration file has been introduced to avoid redundancy and ensure consistency across all microservices.

Update config setting names and identifiers
The configuration settings in the YAML files and DTOs have been updated. Changes include modifications of the git URI to HTTPS, correction of readiness and liveness state keys, and changes in configuration property prefixes for card and loans services. Furthermore, rearranges the port configuration to the end of the file and adjusts the active profile setting in cards application.

Update docker-compose configurations and application.yml files
This commit updates the RabbitMQ version, and modifies application.yml in different modules. It also introduces new docker-compose configurations for the prod and QA environments, with adjustments in their respective common-config.yml files. Minor changes include formatting and adding certain properties in the application yml files, while certain properties in pom.xml files have been modified. Furthermore, a new file .gitignore has also been introduced.

Minor changes include formatting and adding certain properties in the application yml files, while certain properties in pom.xml files have been modified.
